Transparency.findings: Elevance Health provides detailed, public documentation on its Responsible AI program, including transparency principles, data sharing practices, and requirements for both internal and supplier transparency. These sources collectively demonstrate concrete, verifiable transparency measures in AI deployment and governance.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Elevance Health demonstrates concrete evidence of fairness and bias mitigation through public reports detailing bias testing, third-party equity audits, and explicit requirements for both internal and supplier bias mitigation. These sources show a robust, multi-layered approach to fairness in AI.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: Elevance Health demonstrates robust human oversight and accountability in AI through published workflows, clinical review processes, and explicit accountability frameworks. These measures ensure human-in-the-loop decision-making and clear escalation mechanisms for AI-driven healthcare operations.

Privacy & Security.findings: Elevance Health provides concrete evidence of AI privacy and security, including data anonymization, encryption practices, dedicated security roles, and both internal and supplier data protection policies. These measures are publicly documented and address AI-specific privacy and security requirements.

Governance & Accountability.findings: Elevance Health provides detailed, public documentation of its AI governance and accountability frameworks, including NIST-aligned governance, third-party audits, compliance protocols, and board-level oversight. Supplier governance requirements are also clearly defined.

summary.overallFindings: Elevance Health demonstrates comprehensive, concrete, and verifiable Responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides detailed public documentation, robust governance frameworks, and clear evidence of fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, and external accountability. These practices collectively indicate a mature and transparent approach to Responsible AI in healthcare.
